<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111941</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111941</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Igra spomin: sličica + beseda</string>
            <string language="en">Concentration (Memory) - game</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konzentration (Speicher) - Spiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Concentration (mémoire) - jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Concentração (memória) - jogo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Concentrazione (memoria) - gioco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκέντρωση (μνήμη) - παιχνίδι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Concentración (memoria) - juego</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sličice in besede natisnemo na trši karton. Učenci lahko sami izrežejo sličice in besede ter nato ob igri urijo spomin in branje. Za daljšo obstojnost posamezne sličice in besede plastificiramo.</string>
            <string language="en">Set of images and text that can be printed and cut to make set of cards that are suitable to play Concentration (Memory).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">spomin</string>
            <string language="en">memory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">play</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slika</string>
            <string language="en">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">beseda</string>
            <string language="en">word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">branje</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Set Bilder und Text, die gedruckt werden können 
und Schnitt, um Set von den Karten zu bilden, die für Spiel 
Konzentration (Speicher) verwendbar sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ensemble d'images et de texte qui peuvent être 
imprimés et coupe pour faire l'ensemble des cartes qui conviennent à
la concentration de jeu (mémoire).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo das imagens e do texto que podem ser 
imprimidos e corte para fazer o jogo dos cartões que são apropriados
à concentração do jogo (memória).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insieme delle immagini e del testo che possono 
essere stampati e taglio per fare l'insieme delle schedi che sono 
adatte a concentrazione del gioco (memoria).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνολο εικόνων και κειμένου που μπορεί να τυπωθεί και
αποκοπή για να κάνει το σύνολο καρτών που είναι κατάλληλες να 
παίξουν τη συγκέντρωση (μνήμη).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunto de las imágenes y del texto que se 
pueden imprimir y corte para hacer el conjunto de las tarjetas que son
convenientes a la concentración del juego (memoria).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Speicher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mémoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">memória</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">palavra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">memoria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immagine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">parola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μνήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παιχνίδι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εικόνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λέξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
